description: Complete system overview documenting the psychic reading platform architecture, including core components, business logic flow, and key subsystems
Detailed documentation of core data models (User, Session, Message, Transaction) and their relationships, including validation rules and business constraints
Implementation details of the real-time per-minute billing system, including rate calculation, revenue splitting, and automatic session termination logic
Documentation of the WebRTC session lifecycle, including session establishment, state management, participant tracking, and termination conditions
Detailed documentation of payment processing workflows, including transaction handling, reader payouts, platform fees, and balance management
